mainText:
Even though we all knew Steve was ill, hearing the news of his passing is
most shocking to the extent I felt it personally.

He changed our lives with his incredible vision which resonated in his
beautiful products and in my case being a 60 year old apple user and admirer
I can only think that he has  left the weird and confusing world in a better
place.

Rest well good man and best to all his loved ones..
author: Michael
